title: Building Your First WhatsApp Chatbot
description: This is a real n8n workflow template: Building Your First WhatsApp Chatbot. It has been viewed 331713 times on n8n.io.
disclaimer: This workflow template is provided as-is for educational and demonstration purposes. Please ensure you comply with WhatsApp's terms of service and data protection regulations when implementing chatbots. The authors are not responsible for any misuse or violations.

overview.title: Building Your First WhatsApp Chatbot
overview.description: This comprehensive workflow demonstrates how to build an intelligent WhatsApp chatbot using n8n. The bot can handle customer inquiries, provide automated responses, and integrate with various AI services for enhanced user experience.

logicalBlocks.title: Message Reception & Validation
logicalBlocks.description: Handles incoming WhatsApp messages, validates message format, and filters out unwanted content.

logicalBlocks.title: AI Processing & Response Generation
logicalBlocks.description: Processes user messages through AI models to generate contextual and helpful responses.

logicalBlocks.title: Response Delivery & Feedback
logicalBlocks.description: Delivers generated responses back to users and collects feedback for continuous improvement.

logicalBlocks.title: Monitoring & Logging
logicalBlocks.description: Tracks conversation metrics, logs interactions, and monitors system performance.

nodeDetails.name: WhatsApp Trigger
nodeDetails.configDescription: Configured to listen for incoming WhatsApp messages with webhook URL and authentication credentials.

nodeDetails.name: Message Router
nodeDetails.configDescription: Routes messages based on content type, language, and user intent using conditional logic.

nodeDetails.name: AI Processor
nodeDetails.configDescription: Uses GPT model to generate contextual responses based on conversation history and user context.

nodeDetails.name: Response Formatter
nodeDetails.configDescription: Formats AI responses for WhatsApp compatibility, adds emojis, and ensures message length limits.

nodeDetails.name: WhatsApp Sender
nodeDetails.configDescription: Sends formatted responses back to users via WhatsApp API with delivery confirmation.

nodeDetails.name: Conversation Logger
nodeDetails.configDescription: Logs all conversations to Google Sheets for analysis and quality improvement.
